May 31, 2022
Bobcat2022
Let’s be honest, for a character whose powers are "whatever the plot needs, as long as it's red," this dial is so straightforward as to be frankly dull. But I appreciate that the headlining characters in this set got two-or-three very different designs each, and this can be the common one, sure. Decent chunk of Stealth in this set, and plenty of powers that key off adjacency. If you’re seeing those pieces emerge from boosters at your Sealed event, what do you want? A Stealth-busting Energy Explosion-er. No need to overcomplicate it.
May 14, 2022

I believe the reason for the low defend is so she can heal other clix easier.

I feel like you are paying a lot here for energy explosion. 17defend is also something i hate seeing on a dial, there aren't many 16 or less def out there.
